    • Method Detail

      • playRow

        public void playRow(int column)
        Attempts to play a specified column.
        Parameters:
        column - the column to attempt a game piece placement on.

      • changePlayerName

        public void changePlayerName(java.lang.String newName,
                             int index)
        Changes the name of a player with a certain index. Currently only for 2 players
        Parameters:
        newName - the requested name of player.
        index - the index of the player whose name should be changed.

      • getPlayerName

        public java.lang.String getPlayerName(int index)
        Gets a player name.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the player's name.
        Returns:
        the player with the corresponding index.

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        Starts a fresh board. High score and player names are retained.

      • getHighScore

        public java.lang.String getHighScore()
        Gets the high score in descending order. New line between each player.
        Returns:
        the high score.

      • saveToFile

        public void saveToFile(java.io.File selectedFile)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the state of the model including high scores and player names.
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - a file to save the state to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file could not be written to.

      • loadFromFile

        public void loadFromFile(java.io.File selectedFile)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads the state of the model including high scores and player names.
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - a file from which the states are read. Has to be saved by the saveToFile method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file could not be read from.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there is no class in the classpath which name is Model.
